data.message: I've been told all morning that my name was chosen for this lottery but I have to pay fees?

replies.message: Hi Wanda. This is a hoax. We strongly suggest that you don't provide any personal information and report spam using these tips: http://on.fb.me/1mZaa3i. -Rey
